SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.diffs

Class DiffGenerator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.lightModel.diffs.DiffGenerator
public class DiffGenerator extends Object
This class is used to generate the diffs that are sent to the client to update the lightModel

    • draw

      public static List<DeckDiff> draw(DrawableCard deckType, int pos, Game game)
      Generates a diff that updates the deck with a new card after one is drawn
      Parameters:
      deckType - the type of the deck
      pos - the position of the card (2 = deck; 0,1 = buffer)
      Returns:
      the diff that replace the buffer or the deck card drawn on the lightModel

    • placeCodexDiff

      public static CodexDiffPlacement placeCodexDiff(String placer, LightPlacement placement, Codex codex)
      Generates a diff that updates the deck with a new card after one is place
      Parameters:
      placer - the nickname of the player that placed the card
      placement - the light placement of the card
      codex - the codex of the player that placed the card
      Returns:
      a CodexDiffPlacement containing all the updated info for the player that placed the card

    • updateJoinStartCard

      public static GameDiffJoin updateJoinStartCard(Game game, List<String> activePlayers, String nickname)
      Generate a diff for a player who is joining during the "Start Card" phase
      Parameters:
      game - the game to which the player is joining
      activePlayers - the list of players that are active in that game
      nickname - the nickname of the player that is joining
      Returns:
      a GameDiffJoin containing all the diffs needed to update the lightModel of the player that is joining

    • updateChosePawn

      public static GameDiffJoin updateChosePawn(Game game, List<String> activePlayers, String nickname)
      Generate a diff for a player who is joining during the "Chose Pawn" phase
      Parameters:
      game - the game to which the player is joining
      activePlayers - the list of players that are active in that game
      nickname - the nickname of the player that is joining
      Returns:
      a GameDiffJoin containing all the diffs needed to update the lightModel of the player that is joining

      Generate a diff for a player who is joining during the "Actual Game" phase
      Parameters:

    • getPawnCurrentState

      public static List<GameDiff> getPawnCurrentState(Game game)
      Generate a diff for updating the pawn in the lightModel. If no pawn is chosen, the diff will be created with the default constructor
      Parameters:
      game - the game from which the pawn state is taken
      Returns:
      a list of GameDiff containing the diffs of the pawn. Each diff will either be empty or contain the pawn chosen by a player

    • getHandYourCurrentState

      public static List<HandDiff> getHandYourCurrentState(Player player)
      Parameters:
      player - the user to which sends the hand diffs
      Returns:
      a list of diffs containing the current state of the hand of the subscriber

    • getHandOtherCurrentState

      public static List<HandOtherDiff> getHandOtherCurrentState(Game game, String nickname)
      Parameters:
      game - the subscriber to which sends the hand of the other players
      Returns:
      a list of diffs containing the current state of the hand of the other players
